room_title: Escape room "In Hot Water" by Escape Rehoboth in Rehoboth Beach
review: What a great adventure! Challenging and fun! We had a blast!

room_title: Escape room "In Hot Water" by Escape Rehoboth in Rehoboth Beach
review: Great option for rainy days, evenings, or just a break from the heat. Staff was awesome, the room was cool, the puzzles were fun. We went with two kids, 10 and 12 and six adults, 25-50. Everybody contributed to solving the room and we can't wait to go back and try another one!
